from zExceptions import Unauthorized
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 order = state_change['object']
 
 setup_service_relative_url = order.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceSetupResource()
 isTransitionPossible = portal.portal_workflow.isTransitionPossible
 
 instance_portal_type_list = ["Software Instance","Slave Instance"]
 for order_line in order.getMovementList():
 if order_line.getResource() == setup_service_relative_url:
 computer_partition = order_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Computer Partition")
 if computer_partition is None:
 if not order.Delivery_isDestinationSectionAllowedToRequest():
 raise Unauthorized('Request disallowed')
 software_release = order_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Software Release")
 software_instance = order_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type=instance_portal_type_list)
 
 hosting_subscription = order_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Hosting Subscription")
 open_order_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type="Open Sale Order Line",
 validation_state="validated",
 aggregate_relative_url=hosting_subscription.getRelativeUrl(),
 destination_section_relative_url=order.getDestinationSection())
 if open_order_line is not None:
 open_order = open_order_line.getParentValue()
 computer_partition_relative_url = open_order.OpenSaleOrder_restrictMethodAsShadowUser(
 open_order=open_order,
 callable_object=open_order.OpenSaleOrder_findPartition,
 argument_list=[software_release.getUrlString(), software_instance.getSourceReference(),
 software_instance.getPortalType(), software_instance.getSlaXmlAsDict()])
 order_line.edit(
 aggregate_list=order_line.getAggregateList()+[computer_partition_relative_url])
